acf.title: Global Head of Equities Technology
acf.bio_copy:
Sanket Kumar is Global Head of Equities Technology and responsible for leading technology strategy for the firm’s RV Fundamental Equity, Quantitative Strategies and Equity Arbitrage businesses.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2020, Sanket was at Balyasny Asset Management, where he was Chief Information Officer, overseeing all technology functions at the firm, as well as Global Execution and Trading activity. Prior to that, he spent more than a decade at Citadel, where he had a range of roles and last served as Director of Technology, managing Equities and Treasury Technology. He began his career in finance at Goldman Sachs, where he worked in Prime Brokerage Technology.

Sanket received a Bachelors in Computer Science from BIT Mesra.
